text: I could meet you at the bus station: "No, I said, "outside your office." I could not endure the thought of another wait at the bus station. He was there punctually. Dressed in a loud tartan shirt and abbreviated shorts he looked hardly more than a cheerful, good-natured boy: He settled me into the car with touching care and then drove like a fiend along the river road.
